MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G23 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Carbost Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:58am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:28pm on the 19th of March 2021
